summary.span: 命名空间提供支持使用语言集成查询 (LINQ) 进行查询的类和接口。

span.span: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间是中 System.Core 程序集 （System.Core.dll)。The namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll). 类包含[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]实现的对象进行操作的标准查询运算符。The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . 类包含[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]实现的对象进行操作的标准查询运算符。The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . 有关 LINQ to SQL 的信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
